title: Getting Started with Next.js
content: This is a starter post about setting up a Next.js project and the basics of routing.

title: Static Site Generation
content: Learn how SSG builds pages at compile time using getStaticProps and getStaticPaths.

title: Dynamic Routes
content: Dynamic routes let you map pages like /blog/[id] to your data.

title: API Routes
content: API routes run on the server and can be protected with middleware.

title: Image Optimization
content: Use next/image to optimize size, formats, and prevent layout shift.
